collectible.title: (WIP) Sack of Storing
collectible.subtitle: One convienient receptable for all your equipment, tools, and mutilated bodies
collectible.text:
"You can keep it or whatever. Put stuff in it, if you want. I've already got a +4 version, so I don't need this one."
It's empty, aside from 50 feet of hempen rope.

collectible.title: (WIP) An Achievement
collectible.text: Did... Did Aaravi drop this? Are achievements physical things?
collectible.unlock: See Aaravi level up her poker skill. This can only happen if she's still in the game after 30 total rounds.
